channel.title: Auto-Attack
channel.description:
Anyone know how to make it so when your fighting its auto attack, and its not to fast either, its the same speed as RuneScape.
If you do can you post how? Thanks
Be great if you can post it here, Ill have to check it later, got like 20 mins till schools over, and Ill check when I get home. Ima go play some of the games that suprisengly still haven't got blocked from the schools server.. :|
